name: dotnet
description: Platform agnostic installation of .NET Core SDKORRUNTIME 2.0.0

scripts.pack-both: tsc && static-link --force && node ./.scripts/go.js && cd ./runtime && npm pack && cd .. && cd ./sdk && npm pack
scripts.publish-both: tsc && static-link --force && node ./.scripts/go.js && cd ./runtime && npm publish --tag preview && cd .. && cd ./sdk && npm publish --tag preview
scripts.prepublishOnly: node -e "throw new Error('DONT PUBLISH THIS HERE. USE npm run publish-preview.')"
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && touch package-lock.json && rm package-lock.json && touch yarn.lock && rm yarn.lock && npm install && static-link --debug --force
